title: Lowell National Historical Park: Education
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Education             Education       The Tsongas Industrial History Center is a partnership between Lowell National Historical Park and the University of Massachusetts/Lowell. The education programs available through the Center combine the historical resources in Lowell with focused interactive learning. Please visit the Tsongas Industrial History Center for more information, or call 978-970-5080      The Lowell Civic Collaborative- A Guidebook for projects between community colleges and National Parks. Click here for the guidebook.      Online Lesson Plan - Land Use in Lowell: Mapping Industrial Change
